content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly describe ONE purpose of the address in the excerpt. Briefly describe ONE immediate historical development illustrated by the address in the excerpt. Briefly explain ONE way the address in the excerpt provides information about the broader international context within which it was created.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
